definition: short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident
Control Yuan, a watchdog under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan

pinyin: zhong1 gong4 zhong1 yang1 ji4 wei3 jian1 cha2 bu4

definition: National Supervision Commission of the PRC, anti-corruption agency established in 2018
pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Jian1 cha2 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

sentences.english: Who dares, and I compare? Who will win, who belongs to the Ministry of Supervision site.
sentences.chinese: 谁敢和我比？谁赢，监察部的地盘属于谁。

sentences.english: As a result, the supervisory organs became dependency on the government and powerful ministers came into being.
sentences.chinese: 监察机构成了政府的附庸，为权臣的产生开辟了道路。

sentences.english: To be responsible for the daily administration of the Coal Mine Supervision Specialists of the state.
sentences.chinese: 负责国家煤矿安全监察专员的日常管理工作。

sentences.english: He was a Standing Officer for Ombudsman of Korea.
sentences.chinese: 他还是韩国的行政监察官。

sentences.english: The first part is about the defined theory of the discipline inspection supervises evidence.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分对纪检监察证据的理论界定进行了论述。

sentences.english: Some overseer structures that are supposed to drop loot will now do so.
sentences.chinese: 一些监察官舰船已正确掉落战利品。

sentences.english: Odour monitoring in SHW STW was conducted weekly and the results were in order.
sentences.chinese: 渠务署每周进行臭味的监察，而结果是正常的。

sentences.english: To guide the discipline inspection on the institutions affiliated to the Ministry and the railway work styles.
sentences.chinese: 指导部属单位纪检监察工作，以及路风监察工作。

sentences.english: To guide the discipline inspection on the institutions affiliated to the Ministry and the railway work styles.
sentences.chinese: 指导部属单位纪检监察工作，以及路风监察工作。

sentences.english: Whitman was cleared of the conflict by the EPA inspector general.
sentences.chinese: 环境署监察长使惠特曼从以权谋私的指责中得以开脱。

sentences.english: The administrative supervision is one of components of the national political system.
sentences.chinese: 行政监察制度是国家政治制度的组成部分。

sentences.english: You must monitor the old man's illness.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要监察这位老人的病情。

sentences.english: Should be given disciplinary action by the discipline inspection and supervision departments.
sentences.chinese: 应当给予纪律处分的，由纪检监察部门处理。

sentences.english: Regulative authorities will closely scrutinize a business plan at this stage.
sentences.chinese: 调控当局将密切监察在这个阶段的商业计划。

sentences.english: Third, the completeness of the local supervisory system;
sentences.chinese: 其三，地方监察制度的完备和崇重。

sentences.english: Monitors the progress of ship under repairs or construction.
sentences.chinese: 监察船入坞修理或建造的进度。

definition: to monitor/to keep a close watch over/surveillance
to dispatch (sb) in an official capacity/to be posted (as an ambassador, foreign correspondent etc)
Control Yuan, a watchdog under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan
